title: How do i get out of bronze when im visibly better than everyone else.
body:
Now this aint a "im so good i deserve challenger blah blah blah" i know im no faker.

But i do know what a minimap is.

I do buy pink wards to counter eve, fuck i buy pink wards in general just so i can have more vision because of knowing what a minimap is.

Im so aware of the game i actually have my pings muted because 90% of pings are stuff i already know or people teling me to back just before i get that triple kill using my ulty as singed, and besides i watch chat anyway to make sure people arent saying stuff in chat that i need to read.

I can reliably win my lane, against pretty much most match ups, even going as far as absolutely trashing most teemos with singed (im a singed main) or my favorite when i 1v1'd a gold 3 draven and went 5/0 against him with more cs.

My last hitting isnt great but i play singed so i end up with the most cs in the game anyway.

And i know how to asses the risk in most teamfights.

This results in an 80% winrate when im not getting matched with cancer all day.

And in the one or two days where i get unlucky and get the special shoolbus on my teams, it will only drop as low as 50 so  im breaking even, 40 at worst.

So why cant i break out of bronze?

Like there is a problem with matchmaking when a player is capable of hitting their b2 promos 3 times in one day, which requires an incredible winrate

but is getting teams so bad that they cant actually close the promos  after reaching them.

Now if this sounds a little ranty this is because i just came from a game where i got demoted back to b4 despite blowing a blow vessel trying to carry a pretty trash team.

what gets me, is in norms i get matched with plats and golds, and i play troll builds in norms and still win (jungle thresh anyone?)

So clearly i can cut it at a higher elo.

Why is oce bronze this bad that i cant carry this shit?

What about this region in particular makes our bronze players so god damn terrible?

is it the tribunal?

Is it our player count?

its statistically impossible for 70% of players to be winning 60% of their games and not gaining elo

replies.body:
The last 10 ranked games you played you lost 7
scores follow:
Recent to latest
1. Sona 7/4/18 (Win)
2. Sona 6/9/20 (Lost)
3. Sona 6/5/23 (Win)
4. Singed 1/3/3 (Lost)
5. Singed 3/3/5 (Lost)
6. Thresh 2/5/11 (Lost)
7. Shaco 3/6/3 (Lost)
8. Singed 8/5/20 (Win)
9. Thresh 2/10/6 (Lost)
10. Sona 2/10/11 (Lost)

... and you wonder why your still in bronze?

P.S. Go look at my match history if you want, but just remember 1 thing I main Tank top and Tanky Supports and within my last 12 games I've only played 7 tanks I tries ADC but as you see that didn't work (Sivir 2/11 I think) But I'm still trying new roles. So I'm not stuck in Support and Top lane my whole life.
you cant judge just by those scores and to think that you can is ignorant

Ive been on heavy tilt the last couple days thanks to my constant b2 promos, you try getting your promos 3 times in one day and getting troll teams in every promo and not going on tilt.

When im not on tilt i pull an 80% win rate in 20 games.

So thats roughly 4 losses per 20 games.

Tell me again that i should be in bronze with winrates like that.
Infact for proof of this just scroll my match history back to about monday and everything before that, and check my history there, almost nothing but wins

oh and further more that 7/4/18 game was against a gold 5 tristana

he proved hes gold 5 when he jumped on his main and trashed me 1v1
You are only going to improve and it is quite easy to get out of bronzes. When I was in bronze 5, It took me like 2 months to start carrying every game in bronze until I eventually got into silver 5.

Your KDA is 4.3 / 8.0 / 12.3 which is really bad, you should improve your KDA.
BTW I main ADC, not so much in other lane

you dont buy enough pink wards, let alone place wards/your trinket much at all from the games ive seen
always buy sightstone as a support. ALWAYS
place your trinket as soon as it comes up, and upgrade it or change to sweeper as soon as you think you can
take out gold gen. seals for flat armour ones
your singed masteries hurt my eyes, you have 22 in defense yet you have double edged sword, wot
level mega adhesive before level 13....srsly dude y....
you die way too many times as a singed even though you have movespeed quints, masteries AND swiftness alacrities. you're trolling arent you....
more wards, did i mention that? they're actually pretty cheap. all the non-bronze players buy wards
finish archangels before other full items, most of the time, like 95%, especially on singed
dont.....buy.....tear.....on a support......in fact buy more support items in general, thats what a support does
ok i see you duo with this taric in the bot lane a lot.....tried to help somebody who literally seemed like he deserved help and hes playing sona taric bot lane....

also you dont go on tilt. only platinum+ players go on tilt, because they focus and they know what they're doing and know what they need to do. your cure for tilt is buying more wards, which is actually pretty easy to do
i do take the input on board though.

You have that backwards.

Every elo goes on tilt.

plat + players dont go on tilt as often because they have effectively learned to not go on tilt.

Tilting is when you let your emotions get the better of you and it affects your level of play making you make illogical decisions you wouldnt otherwise make.

Further more those runes and masteries are both under the name "singed experimental" aka i was testing them out to see if they were any good, and for the most part they are, the gp/10 seals actually did wonders for me when laning against counter picks by allowing me to play more passively until i get my rylais without gimping my gold gain by a huge amount.

As for how much i die? I get cocky, i get to about 5/2/10 or something like that with 4 items and just go "you know what, i wonder if i can solo the fed adc" sometimes i do, sometimes i dont, its fun like that.

oh that and im singed, not everyones retarded enough to chase me, my solution to that is to not back until i have literally 10 health, as  a result im usually running around the map at 100 hp bming people into thinking im an easy kill, sometimes they land hard cc and kill me, sometimes they dont cc me and they die, its great.

The games where im buying tear on sona im not the support, as you saw it was sona taric botlane, im the damage dealing portion of that lane, and the tear and chalice lets me use my q practically on cooldown to do massive burst damage from a q auto combo.

The few games i played that build with support was just seeing if it was viable outside that lane (clearly its not)

Oh and an explanation for why i use double edged sword on singed, he has relatively high basedamage, very high base damage infact, and if im playing him properly i shouldnt be getting hit in the first place, his healthbar is mostly just a buffer for adcs and the occasional skillshot i fail to dodge, that and getting trapped in hard cc. the talent is basically all positive because if im doing damage and not getting hit the damage bossts are in my favor.


As for the warding? yes i do need to ward more, no im not warding less than other bronzes im arguably warding more than them.

In my history of ranked ive only seen 2 other people buy a pink ward. thats how low my elo is.

If you were to pose these points to any other player in my elo they would just say "oh so your challenger right? you think your pro right" atleast i can explain my decisions and actions.

Oh and btw as for my singed performance, according to lolskill.net atleast i perform 10% better than the average singed, getting more kills, more assists, more gold, slightly less cs, and like 2.2 deaths more than the average, dying a little more for just more performance overall is a good trade off.

Well one of your first problems I see is that you have your ping's silenced. Who cares if they annoy you with ping's before you get your triple. But what about when they are pinging mia, or where a ward is or even heaven forbid pinging for help. But sure I understand where you're coming, sometimes you get those people who simply seem like they are in fact pinging.

already addressed that "90% of it is stuff i already know" wards and a minimap do wonders

If you check your minimap every 2 seconds you already know the enemy bots support went mia about 30 seconds before you get the mia ping.
Yes. But you don't know where they went. And I wasn't addressing the fact you ignore it. More your mindset about it.
muh team

just because you beat higher elo people in norms doesn't mean you're cut out for it. fun fact, most people don't try hard in norms, and play it to relax and mess around.
I managed to carry this account from bronze 4 I think to silver 5 in like 45 games or so. it's not that hard to get out really.

Yeah i dont try either.

Please read post in full before replying with counter argument that i already precountered.

If i can beat plat players with thresh jangle im pretty sure i can beat atleast silver with something thats really in the meta.

> [{quoted}](name=Infected Walnut,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=f5Gco5Kf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-19T14:12:48.150+0000)
>
> just because you beat higher elo people in norms doesn't mean you're cut out for it. fun fact, most people don't try hard in norms, and play it to relax and mess around.
> I managed to carry this account from bronze 4 I think to silver 5 in like 45 games or so. it's not that hard to get out really.

Static shen :)
Prove it.

Already have on many occasions, hell you want to know how mechanically unchallenging bronze is? 10 games with sona taric bot, 8 wins.

Dont even have to follow the meta to win, just have to faceroll on my keyboard and not run in on stupid stuff.

The issue isnt that im not winning because i clearly am.

its that matchmaking is so broken that im getting people below my current mmr, resulting in very slow mmr gains and MASSIVE mmr drops if i lose.

Umm i'm not any better than you are but i can say you should try someone who has simpler mechanics like annie. I mean you can get out of "elo hell" with a more difficult champion to play effectively, but your best bets are playing "noobstompers" like annie, tryndamere, master yi, jax etc.

I may play well in normals, but when I play ranked with my best champ that I go 80 cs at 10:00 mins (2/0 kda) in normals with I average 70 cs, go 0/1 in lane and feed the 8/0 Vladimir that I attempt to shut down.

I need to work on my game before I play ranked and even though I didn't feed vlad I know that I didn't help with that either which is my problem.

The game finished with me going 2/7 and 170 cs by 20.

And it was my fault for being so reckless.

There's always something to improve on. I was stuck in bronze saying the same things but then i eventually realized that there is always something i could do better. Solo Que is not about the other people, it is about you. You might be doing some things better than an average bronze but your still bronze. This means theirs something that you can be doing better to climb. It inst the easiest thing to just climb but making improvements on yourself will help. One of the best things you can do is NOT BLAIM YOUR TEAM and figure out why your losing games or unable to carry and what you could of done to make a difference. GOOD LUCK
Well, you're playing Singed...
